title: Birth of Capt. Thomas Beverage
description: Capt. Thomas Beverage (born Thomas Beveridge) was born at Mereâ€™s Point, Topsham, Maine.

title: Marriage of Thomas Beverage and Mercy Kent
description: Thomas Beverage married Mercy Kent at Trinity Church in Boston, Massachusetts.

title: James and Josiah purchase 115 acres
description: James Beverage and his brother Josiah purchased 115 acres of land and mill shares from their parents, Thomas and Mercy Beverage.

title: Marriage of James Beverage and Jemima Crabtree
description: James Beverage married Jemima Crabtree on North Haven Island.

title: Death of Benjamin Crabtree Beverage
description: Benjamin Crabtree Beverage died during a diphtheria epidemic on North Haven Island.

title: Birth of Rev. Albion Pierson Beverage
description: Albion Pierson Beverage was born in Dorchester, Massachusetts.

title: Death of Rev. Albion Pierson Beverage
description: Rev. Albion Pierson Beverage died in Silver Spring, Maryland.
